COMMIT.MESSAGE: podman generate systemd: handle --sdnotify correctly When a container was created with `--sdnotify value` we would remove this arg instead of using it like with `--sdnotfiy=value`. Also when the arg is set to ignore we should force conmon in order to make the resulting Type=notify units work. Fixes #15052 Signed-off-by: Paul Holzinger <pholzing@redhat.com>
